page.title: 11BETTING SHOPS
page.content: This shop is open from 11.00am to 5.30pm,after the last race.Bets can be put on horses,dogs,Eurovision Song Contest or Miss World. The takings are between Â£150-Â£200 each day.About Â£750 on a Saturday. The Miners Strike cut the takings by about 50%. Each day one lady manages the shop but on Saturday it takes two. Every betting slip has to pass through a camera which has a timer.Anything taken after a race has started is void.All the sums have to be accurate.There is a speaker for the results. Last saturday the takings were Â£742 but the shop had to pay out Â£701.68.It was not a good day!
